name: WKInterfaceButton
desc: A button in the user interface of your watchOS app.

items.name: func setTitle(String?)
items.desc: Sets the button title to the specified string.

items.name: func setAttributedTitle(NSAttributedString?)
items.desc: Sets the button title to the specified attributed string.

items.name: func setBackgroundColor(UIColor?)
items.desc: Sets the background color of the button.

items.name: func setBackgroundImage(UIImage?)
items.desc: Sets the button’s background image to the specified image.

items.name: func setBackgroundImageData(Data?)
items.desc: Sets the button’s background image to the image in the specified data object.

items.name: func setBackgroundImageNamed(String?)
items.desc: Sets the button’s background image to the image in the named resource file.
